text: @CSIS #Ukraine #Russia #War #InternationalSecurityTwo years have passed since Russia's invasion of Ukraine. It's time to take stock of the situation and look ahead. Join us for a virtual discussion with experts from the CSIS International Security Program to hear their insights on the state of the war, Ukrainian and Russian strategy, and the future of Western aid to Ukraine. Don't miss this opportunity to get informed and stay engaged in this critical global issue.
